import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './CardInfo.css'; const CardInfo = () => { const[name, setName] = useState(null); const[number, setNumber] = useState(null); const[expMonth, setExpMonth] = useState(null); const[expYear, setExpYear] = useState(null); const[cvc, setCVC] = useState(null); return ( <>
